page.title: 20CONCLUSION
page.content: Concord flies daily over the area, on its way from Heathrow to New York. It attracts a variety of reactions,from admiration to objections to its noise and cost. The area has a strong conservationist lobby. Some farms have gone over to organic agriculture, and there is a Health Food shop in Pangbourne. The river Thames provides a source of leisure activity in the area. Apart from the tourists who pass through many local people own small crafts. { CONTRIBUTERS}Little Heath and Denefield Schools, although in Tilehurst, shared this D block. Many of the pupils come from this area. About thirty pupils from each school were involved and a number of teachers. Denefield pupils wrote pages 2 to 9 and Little Heath, pages 1 and 10 to 20.
